name: Fall and Rise of Shimon
description: This is in some sense a sequel to Mediocre Misadventures of Just Simon, after his defeat Shimon survived, but became weaker, now he should return what belongs to him, but to do that, negative guy must overcome obstacles on his way, just like J.S met some villains from indie games, Shimon will fight against heroes of same games, Five Night's At Freddy's, Undertale, Yume Nikki, Touhou Project and even The Boogie Man, in time of  his journey Shimon can learn some useful spells to make his quest a little bit easier, if you tired from some goodie two shoes, help to Shimon stomp them in the dirt and get gack his power and place, place in this world.
